title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still cannot access.

title: Payment Failed - Transaction Not Processed
description: Customer reported that their payment failed even though funds were deducted from their bank account.

title: Website Loading Slowly
description: Customer experiencing very slow load times when accessing the dashboard.

title: App Crashes on Startup
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after launching on Android devices.

title: Unable to Update Profile
description: Customer cannot update their profile details. The Save button is not working.

title: Password Reset Email Not Received
description: Customer requested a password reset but did not receive any email.

title: Error 500 on Checkout Page
description: Customer encountered a server error when trying to complete their order.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: Customer reports that the 2FA code is not being accepted when logging in.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer is unable to download their monthly invoice PDF from the billing section.

title: Notifications Not Received
description: Customer reports they are not receiving push or email notifications.
